title: Multivariate normal distribution probability density function compute the value of the density of a multivariate normal distribution on at n points. — mvnpdf
text: x matrix, n columns (observations) p rows mean vector means varcovM variance-covariance matrix Log logical parameter, zith default TRUE, takes log pdf
